plugin.name: input-method-v1
plugin._long: An implementation of the input-method-v1 protocol. Needed for proper functioning of input methods like Fcitx5.

option.name: enable_text_input_v1
option._short: Enable support for the text-input-v1 protocol, used predominantly by Chromium and Electron apps.

option.name: enable_text_input_v3
option._short: Enable support for the text-input-v3 protocol.
